short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitter URL deshortener. No more t.co URLs, no redirections, only direct links. Faster loading. No tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of t.co redirection stuff? Me too! So here is a simple extension to solve our problem. It works only with https://twitter.com. 
Hide an app icon manually.
